mapper.select: SELECT /* mapper.erd.relation.selectRelationList */ CONCAT(REL.START_ENTITY_ID, '_', REL.END_ENTITY_ID) AS RELATION , REL.RELATION_NM AS RELATION_NAME /* , REL.RELATION_TYPE AS RELATION_TYPE */ , CASE WHEN REL.RELATION_TYPE = 'rel1toN' AND REL.NON_IDEN_YN = 'Y' THEN 'relNonIden' ELSE REL.RELATION_TYPE END AS RELATION_TYPE , REL.RELATION_ID AS RELATION_ID , REL.LINE_COLOR AS COLOR , CASE WHEN REL.START_ENTITY_ID = REL.END_ENTITY_ID THEN 'Y' ELSE NULL END AS RECURSIVE_YN , REL.START_ENTITY_ID , NULL AS START_POSITION , NULL AS START_X , NULL AS START_Y , (SELECT ENTITY_NM FROM ENTITY WHERE PROJECT_ID = REL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = 1.0 AND ENTITY_ID= REL.START_ENTITY_ID ) AS START_ENTITY_NM , REL.END_ENTITY_ID , NULL AS END_POSITION , NULL AS END_X , NULL AS END_Y , (SELECT ENTITY_NM FROM ENTITY WHERE PROJECT_ID = REL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = 1.0 AND ENTITY_ID= REL.END_ENTITY_ID ) AS END_ENTITY_NM , REL.NON_IDEN_YN , NULL AS PATHS , CASE WHEN REL.USE_YN = 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DEL_YN FROM RELATION REL WHERE 1 = 1 AND REL.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID} AND REL.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN} AND NVL( REL.USE_YN, 'Y') = 'Y'

SELECT /* mapper.erd.relation.selectRelationReverseList */ CONCAT(REL.START_ENTITY_ID, '_', REL.END_ENTITY_ID) AS RELATION , REL.RELATION_NM AS RELATION_NAME , REL.RELATION_TYPE AS RELATION_TYPE , REL.RELATION_ID AS RELATION_ID , REL.LINE_COLOR AS COLOR , CASE WHEN REL.START_ENTITY_ID = REL.END_ENTITY_ID THEN 'Y' ELSE NULL END AS RECURSIVE_YN , REL.START_ENTITY_ID AS END_ENTITY_ID , (SELECT ENTITY_NM FROM ENTITY WHERE PROJECT_ID = REL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = 1.0 AND ENTITY_ID= REL.START_ENTITY_ID ) AS END_ENTITY_NM , REL.END_ENTITY_ID AS START_ENTITY_ID , (SELECT ENTITY_NM FROM ENTITY WHERE PROJECT_ID = REL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = 1.0 AND ENTITY_ID= REL.END_ENTITY_ID ) AS START_ENTITY_NM FROM RELATION REL WHERE 1 = 1 AND REL.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID} AND REL.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN} AND REL.START_ENTITY_ID != REL.END_ENTITY_ID AND NVL( REL.USE_YN, 'Y') = 'Y'

SELECT /* mapper.erd.relation.selectRelationListByStartEntity */ CONCAT(REL.START_ENTITY_ID, '_', REL.END_ENTITY_ID) AS RELATION , REL.RELATION_NM AS RELATION_NAME , REL.RELATION_TYPE AS RELATION_TYPE , REL.RELATION_ID AS RELATION_ID , REL.LINE_COLOR AS COLOR , CASE WHEN REL.START_ENTITY_ID = REL.END_ENTITY_ID THEN 'Y' ELSE NULL END AS RECURSIVE_YN , REL.START_ENTITY_ID , NULL AS START_POSITION , NULL AS START_X , NULL AS START_Y , (SELECT ENTITY_NM FROM ENTITY WHERE PROJECT_ID = REL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = 1.0 AND ENTITY_ID= REL.START_ENTITY_ID ) AS START_ENTITY_NM , REL.END_ENTITY_ID , NULL AS END_POSITION , NULL AS END_X , NULL AS END_Y , (SELECT ENTITY_NM FROM ENTITY WHERE PROJECT_ID = REL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = 1.0 AND ENTITY_ID= REL.END_ENTITY_ID ) AS END_ENTITY_NM , REL.NON_IDEN_YN , NULL AS PATHS , CASE WHEN REL.USE_YN = 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DEL_YN FROM RELATION REL WHERE 1 = 1 AND REL.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID} AND REL.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN} AND REL.START_ENTITY_ID = #{ENTITY_ID} AND NVL( REL.USE_YN, 'Y') = 'Y'

SELECT /* mapper.erd.relation.selectRelation */ REL.RELATION_ID , CONCAT(REL.START_ENTITY_ID, '_', REL.END_ENTITY_ID) AS RELATION , REL.RELATION_NM AS RELATION_NAME , REL.RELATION_TYPE AS RELATION_TYPE , REL.LINE_COLOR AS COLOR , CASE WHEN REL.START_ENTITY_ID = REL.END_ENTITY_ID THEN 'Y' ELSE NULL END AS RECURSIVE_YN , REL.START_ENTITY_ID , REL.END_ENTITY_ID , REL.NON_IDEN_YN AS NON_IDEN_YN FROM RELATION REL WHERE 1 = 1 AND REL.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID} AND REL.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN} AND REL.RELATION_ID = #{RELATION_ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE COL /* mapper.erd.relation.deleteRelationColumnFK */ FROM COLMN COL WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID } AND VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN } AND ENTITY_ID = #{END_ENTITY_ID } AND FK_COLMN_NM IN (SELECT COLMN_NM FROM COLMN A WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = COL.PROJECT_ID AND A.VERSN = COL.VERSN AND NVL(A.PK_YN, 'N') = CASE WHEN #{NON_IDEN_YN} = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AND A.ENTITY_ID = #{START_ENTITY_ID })

UPDATE /* mapper.erd.relation.deleteRelationColumnFK */ COLMN COL
JOIN (SELECT FK.ENTITY_ID AS FK_ENTITY_ID, FK.COLMN_ID AS FK_COLMN_ID, A.COLMN_NM , CASE WHEN FK.USE_YN = 'Y' AND FK.COLMN_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS USE_YN , A.USE_YN AS COL_USE_YN , FK.SEQ , CASE WHEN FK.NON_IDEN_YN = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE FK.PK_YN END AS PK_YN , CASE WHEN #{NON_IDEN_YN} = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS PK_YN_NON_IDEN_YN FROM COLMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT FK_COL.ENTITY_ID, FK_COL.COLMN_ID, FK_COL.COLMN_NM, FK_COL.ATTR_NM , FK_COL.SEQ , FK_COL.PK_YN , FK_REL.NON_IDEN_YN , FK_COL.USE_YN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY FK_COL.ENTITY_ID, FK_COL.COLMN_ID, FK_REL.NON_IDEN_YN DESC) RN FROM COLMN FK_COL , RELATION FK_REL WHERE 1 = 1 AND FK_REL.PROJECT_ID = FK_COL.PROJECT_ID AND FK_REL.VERSN = FK_COL.VERSN AND FK_REL.START_ENTITY_ID = FK_COL.ENTITY_ID AND FK_REL.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID } AND FK_REL.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN } AND FK_REL.END_ENTITY_ID = #{END_ENTITY_ID } AND FK_REL.START_ENTITY_ID != #{START_ENTITY_ID } AND FK_COL.PK_YN = 'Y' AND FK_REL.END_ENTITY_ID != FK_REL.START_ENTITY_ID ) FK ON A.COLMN_NM = FK.COLMN_NM AND 1 = FK.RN
WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID } AND A.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN } /* AND NVL(A.PK_YN, 'N') = CASE WHEN __NON_IDEN_YN__ = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END */ AND A.ENTITY_ID = #{START_ENTITY_ID } ) FK ON ( COL.COLMN_NM = FK.COLMN_NM OR ( COL.FK_ENTITY_ID = FK.FK_ENTITY_ID AND COL.FK_COLMN_ID = FK.FK_COLMN_ID)) SET COL.USE_YN = CASE WHEN FK.USE_YN ='Y' THEN FK.USE_YN ELSE 'N' END /* , COL.PK_YN = CASE WHEN FK.PK_YN ='Y' THEN FK.PK_YN ELSE FK.PK_YN END */ , COL.SEQ = NVL(FK.SEQ, COL.SEQ) , COL.DML_TCD = CASE WHEN FK.USE_YN ='Y' AND COL.USE_YN = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN COL.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C_D' THEN 'DML_TCD_C' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U' END WHEN FK.USE_YN != 'Y' AND COL.USE_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C' THEN 'DML_TCD_C_D' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U_D' END ELSE COL.DML_TCD END , COL.DML_DT = CASE WHEN FK.USE_YN ='Y' AND COL.USE_YN = 'N' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN FK.USE_YN != 'Y' AND COL.USE_YN = 'Y' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ELSE COL.DML_DT END , COL.TRT_DT = CASE WHEN FK.USE_YN = 'N' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ELSE COL.TRT_DT END , COL.TRT_USR_UID = CASE WHEN FK.USE_YN = 'N' THEN #{SESSION_USR_UID} ELSE COL.TRT_USR_UID END
, COL.FK_ENTITY_ID = CASE WHEN (COL.USE_YN = 'Y' OR FK.USE_YN = 'Y') AND FK.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL.FK_ENTITY_ID IS NOT NULL AND COL.FK_ENTITY_ID != '' THEN COL.FK_ENTITY_ID WHEN FK.FK_ENTITY_ID IS NOT NULL THEN FK.FK_ENTITY_ID ELSE COL.FK_ENTITY_ID END , COL.FK_COLMN_ID = CASE WHEN (COL.USE_YN = 'Y' OR FK.USE_YN = 'Y') AND FK.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL.FK_COLMN_ID IS NOT NULL AND COL.FK_COLMN_ID != '' THEN COL.FK_COLMN_ID WHEN FK.FK_COLMN_ID IS NOT NULL THEN FK.FK_COLMN_ID ELSE COL.FK_COLMN_ID END WHERE COL.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID } AND COL.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN } AND COL.ENTITY_ID = #{END_ENTITY_ID } AND COL.FK_COLMN_NM IN (SELECT COLMN_NM FROM COLMN A WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = COL.PROJECT_ID AND A.VERSN = COL.VERSN AND (NVL(A.PK_YN, 'N') = CASE WHEN #{NON_IDEN_YN} = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END OR ( A.PK_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'N') ) AND A.ENTITY_ID = #{START_ENTITY_ID })
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* mapper.erd.relation.updateRelationColumnFK */ COLMN COL_E JOIN COLMN COL_S ON COL_E.PROJECT_ID = COL_S.PROJECT_ID AND COL_E.VERSN = COL_S.VERSN AND COL_E.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID } AND COL_E.VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN } AND COL_E.ENTITY_ID = #{END_ENTITY_ID } AND COL_S.ENTITY_ID = #{START_ENTITY_ID } AND #{END_ENTITY_ID } != #{START_ENTITY_ID } /* AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' */ /* AND COL_S.USE_YN = 'Y' */ AND ( COL_E.COLMN_NM = COL_S.COLMN_NM OR COL_E.COLMN_ID = COL_S.COLMN_ID /* OR COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' OR COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' OR ( COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID = COL_S.ENTITY_ID AND COL_E.FK_COLMN_ID = COL_S.COLMN_ID ) */ ) SET COL_E.DOMAIN_ID = COL_S.DOMAIN_ID /* , COL_E.ATTR_NM = COL_S.ATTR_NM */ , COL_E.DTYPE = COL_S.DTYPE , COL_E.LEN1 = COL_S.LEN1 , COL_E.LEN2 = COL_S.LEN2 , COL_E.DML_TCD = CASE WHEN NVL(COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID, '') != '' AND ( COL_S.PK_YN != 'Y' OR NVL(COL_S.USE_YN, 'Y') = 'N') THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C' THEN 'DML_TCD_C_D' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U_D' END WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'N' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C_D' THEN 'DML_TCD_C' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U' END WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C' THEN 'DML_TCD_C_D' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U_D' END WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'DML_TCD_U' WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN COL_E.DML_TCD END WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='N' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C' THEN 'DML_TCD_C_D' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U_D' END WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C_D' THEN 'DML_TCD_C' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U' END WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.DML_TCD = 'DML_TCD_C' THEN 'DML_TCD_C_D' ELSE 'DML_TCD_U_D' END WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'DML_TCD_U' WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN COL_E.DML_TCD END ELSE COL_E.DML_TCD END , COL_E.DML_DT = CASE WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'N' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN COL_E.DML_DT WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN COL_E.DML_DT END WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='N' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN COL_E.DML_DT WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN COL_E.DML_DT END ELSE COL_E.DML_DT END , COL_E.APLY_USR_UID = #{SESSION_USR_UID } , COL_E.APLY_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* , COL_E.COLMN_SCD = COL_S.COLMN_SCD */ , COL_E.NOTNULL_YN = CASE WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'relNonIden' THEN 'N' ELSE CASE WHEN COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END END , COL_E.SEQ = CASE WHEN COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(COL_S.SEQ,10) < 100 THEN NVL(COL_S.SEQ,10) ELSE COL_S.SEQ /10 END WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.SEQ < 100 THEN 100+COL_E.SEQ WHEN COL_E.SEQ > 100 AND COL_E.SEQ < 300 THEN COL_E.SEQ WHEN COL_E.SEQ >= 300 AND COL_E.SEQ <= 2000 THEN 100+ COL_E.SEQ/10 ELSE 100+COL_E.SEQ/100 END
ELSE COL_E.SEQ END , COL_E.PK_YN = CASE WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'relNonIden' THEN 'N' WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'rel1toN' AND #{NON_IDEN_YN} = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHEN COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE COL_E.PK_YN END END , COL_E.USE_YN = CASE WHEN NVL(COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID, '') != '' AND ( COL_S.PK_YN != 'Y' OR NVL(COL_S.USE_YN, 'Y') = 'N') THEN 'N' WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'N' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN 'N' WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN COL_S.USE_YN END WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='N' THEN 'N' WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.USE_YN ='Y' THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN 'N' WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN (NVL(COL_E.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_E.PK_YN = '' ) AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN COL_S.USE_YN END ELSE COL_S.USE_YN END , COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID = CASE WHEN COL_S.FK_ENTITY_ID = COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID THEN COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID WHEN COL_S.ENTITY_ID = COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID THEN COL_S.ENTITY_ID WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'relNonIden' THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'N' THEN COL_S.ENTITY_ID ELSE NULL END WHEN COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(COL_S.FK_ENTITY_ID, '') = '' THEN COL_S.ENTITY_ID ELSE COL_S.FK_ENTITY_ID END ELSE COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID END END
, COL_E.FK_COLMN_ID = CASE WHEN COL_S.FK_ENTITY_ID = COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID THEN COL_E.FK_COLMN_ID WHEN COL_S.COLMN_ID = COL_E.FK_COLMN_ID THEN COL_S.COLMN_ID WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'relNonIden' THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'N' THEN COL_S.COLMN_ID ELSE NULL END WHEN COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(COL_S.FK_COLMN_ID, '') = '' THEN COL_S.COLMN_ID ELSE COL_S.FK_COLMN_ID END ELSE COL_S.FK_COLMN_ID END END , COL_E.FK_COLMN_NM = CASE WHEN COL_S.FK_COLMN_ID = COL_E.FK_ENTITY_ID THEN COL_E.FK_COLMN_NM WHEN COL_S.COLMN_ID = COL_E.FK_COLMN_ID THEN COL_S.COLMN_NM WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'relNonIden' THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN COL_E.PK_YN = 'Y' AND (NVL(COL_S.PK_YN, 'N') = 'N' OR COL_S.PK_YN = '') THEN CASE WHEN COL_E.USE_YN = 'N' THEN COL_S.COLMN_NM ELSE NULL END WHEN COL_S.PK_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(COL_S.FK_COLMN_NM, '') = '' THEN COL_S.COLMN_NM ELSE COL_S.FK_COLMN_NM END ELSE COL_S.FK_COLMN_NM END END , COL_E.COLMN_DESC = COL_S.COLMN_DESC
, COL_E.NUMB_MTH = COL_S.NUMB_MTH , COL_E.LAST_UPD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , COL_E.LAST_UPD_USR_UID = #{SESSION_USR_NM}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* mapper.erd.relation.saveRelationColumnFK */ INTO COLMN ( PROJECT_ID , VERSN , ENTITY_ID , COLMN_ID , DOMAIN_ID , COLMN_NM , ATTR_NM , DTYPE , LEN1 , LEN2 , TRT_DT , DML_TCD , DML_DT , APLY_USR_UID , APLY_DT , COLMN_SCD , NOTNULL_YN , SEQ , PK_YN , FK_ENTITY_ID , FK_COLMN_ID , FK_COLMN_NM , COLMN_DESC , USE_YN , NUMB_MTH , FRST_INS_DT , FRST_INS_USR_UID , LAST_UPD_DT , LAST_UPD_USR_UID ) SELECT PROJECT_ID , VERSN , #{END_ENTITY_ID } AS ENTITY_ID , COLMN_ID AS COLMN_ID , DOMAIN_ID , COLMN_NM , ATTR_NM , DTYPE , LEN1 , LEN2 , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , DML_TCD , DML_DT , APLY_USR_UID , APLY_DT , COLMN_SCD , CASE WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'relNonIden' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END NOTNULL_YN , NVL(SEQ/10, 10) AS SEQ , CASE WHEN #{RELATION_TYPE} = 'relNonIden' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END PK_YN , ENTITY_ID AS FK_ENTITY_ID , COLMN_ID AS FK_COLMN_ID , COLMN_NM AS FK_COLMN_NM , COLMN_DESC , USE_YN , NUMB_MTH , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{SESSION_USR_NM} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{SESSION_USR_NM} FROM COLMN COL WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID } AND VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN } AND ENTITY_ID = #{START_ENTITY_ID } AND PK_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'Y' FROM COLMN WHERE PROJECT_ID = COL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = COL.VERSN AND ENTITY_ID = #{END_ENTITY_ID } AND (COLMN_NM = COL.COLMN_NM OR COLMN_ID = COL.COLMN_ID ) )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* mapper.erd.relation.updateRelationNonIdenYN */ COLMN COL SET PK_YN = CASE WHEN #{NON_IDEN_YN} = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END , SEQ = CASE WHEN #{NON_IDEN_YN} = 'Y' THEN SEQ ELSE NVL((SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM COLMN A WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = COL.PROJECT_ID AND A.VERSN = COL.VERSN AND A.ENTITY_ID = COL.ENTITY_ID AND PK_YN = 'Y' ),10) + SEQ +10-(SELECT MIN(SEQ) FROM COLMN WHERE PROJECT_ID = COL.PROJECT_ID AND VERSN = COL.VERSN AND FK_COLMN_NM IN (SELECT A.COLMN_NM FROM COLMN A WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = COL.PROJECT_ID AND A.VERSN = COL.VERSN AND A.ENTITY_ID = #{START_ENTITY_ID })) END , LAST_UPD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , LAST_UPD_USR_UID =#{SESSION_USR_NM} WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID } AND VERSN = #{SESSION_VERSN } AND ENTITY_ID = #{END_ENTITY_ID } AND FK_COLMN_NM IN (SELECT A.COLMN_NM FROM COLMN A WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = COL.PROJECT_ID AND A.VERSN = COL.VERSN AND A.ENTITY_ID = #{START_ENTITY_ID } AND A.PK_YN = 'Y' )
